item.title: About
item.description: Mike Arbuzov * Experienced Chief Technology Officer with a demonstrated history of delivering ground breaking solutions in the information technology and services industry. Strong IT professional skilled in E-commerce, User Experience, Security, Scalability and Data Analysis. Passionate and curious using couputers to empower human creativity and build practical working systems through iterative experimentation and let them grow to surpass capabilities of an individual at scale. First programming experience at the age of 9.
